overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto has a diverse social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, with a total of 3,580 followers. Engagement is strong across platforms, particularly with academic and research-oriented content. LinkedIn shows the highest engagement rates, indicating a professional audience interested in research updates and opportunities.

contentThemes.description: Updates on new research papers and grants related to social media and disinformation studies.
Job postings and opportunities for researchers in computational social science.
Information about upcoming presentations at academic conferences.

recommendations: Increase posting frequency on LinkedIn to capitalize on high engagement with research-related content.
Engage more with followers by responding to comments and fostering discussions, particularly on academic topics.

platformInsights.mastodon: Engagement is moderate; focusing on increasing follower interaction could boost visibility.
platformInsights.linkedin: Highest engagement with professional and research-focused content. Opportunities for expanding audience through detailed posts.
platformInsights.bluesky: Solid engagement with academic content; potential to increase audience by collaborating with other researchers.

topPerformingContent.content: Excited to announce that our research team has been awarded a new grant to study information operations across social media platforms.
